mapper.insert:
insert into auction(a_username, a_enddate, a_startprice, a_title, a_content ) values(#{a_username},#{enddate},#{startprice},#{title},#{content})
select last_insert_id()
insert into address(ad_lat, ad_lon, ad_addr, ad_town, a_num) values(#{lat}, #{lon}, #{addr}, #{town}, #{a_num})
mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT MAX(h.o_price) FROM offer h WHERE a.a_num = h.a_num)topprice FROM auction a LEFT JOIN offer b ON a.a_num = b.a_num LEFT JOIN address c ON a.a_num = c.a_num LEFT JOIN `like` d ON a.a_num = d.a_num LEFT JOIN auc_and_pro e ON a.a_num = e.a_num LEFT JOIN product f ON e.p_num = f.p_num LEFT JOIN picture g ON f.p_num = g.p_num WHERE a_sale = #{sale} and a_username = #{a_username} ORDER BY a.a_num DESC

SELECT COUNT(case when a.a_sale = 0 then 1 END) AS salecount, COUNT(case when a.a_sale = 1 then 1 END) AS paycount, COUNT(case when a.a_sale = 2 then 1 END) AS tradecount, COUNT(case when a.a_sale = 3 then 1 END) AS soldcount from auction a LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM offer GROUP BY a_num)b on a.a_num = b.a_num WHERE a.a_username = #{username}

SELECT MONTH(b.pa_time) AS `month`, SUM(c.am_total) AS `total` from auction a INNER JOIN payment b on a.a_num = b.a_num INNER JOIN amount c ON b.pa_num = c.pa_num WHERE a.a_username = #{username} GROUP BY `month`

SELECT *, (SELECT MAX(h.o_price) FROM offer h WHERE a.a_num = h.a_num)topprice FROM auction a LEFT JOIN offer b ON a.a_num = b.a_num LEFT JOIN address c ON a.a_num = c.a_num LEFT JOIN `like` d ON a.a_num = d.a_num LEFT JOIN auc_and_pro e ON a.a_num = e.a_num LEFT JOIN product f ON e.p_num = f.p_num LEFT JOIN picture g ON f.p_num = g.p_num WHERE a.a_num = #{a_num} order by b.o_price DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE auction a LEFT JOIN address b ON a.a_num = b.a_num LEFT JOIN auc_and_pro c ON a.a_num = c.a_num LEFT JOIN product d ON c.p_num = d.p_num SET a.a_content= #{content}, a.a_title = #{title}, a.a_enddate= #{enddate}, a.a_startprice=#{startprice}, b.ad_lat= #{address.lat}, b.ad_lon= #{address.lon}, b.ad_addr= #{address.addr}, b.ad_town= #{address.town}, d.p_brand= #{pro.brand}, d.p_kind = #{pro.kind}, d.p_industry= #{pro.industry}, d.p_year= #{pro.year} WHERE a.a_num = #{a_num}
mapper.delete: DELETE a.*, b.*, c.*, d.*, e.*, f.*, g.* FROM auction a LEFT JOIN offer b ON a.a_num = b.a_num LEFT JOIN address c ON a.a_num = c.a_num LEFT JOIN `like` d ON a.a_num = d.a_num LEFT JOIN auc_and_pro e ON a.a_num = e.a_num LEFT JOIN product f ON e.p_num = f.p_num LEFT JOIN picture g ON f.p_num = g.p_num WHERE a.a_num = #{a_num}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT a.a_num FROM auction a INNER JOIN auc_and_pro b ON a.a_num = b.a_num INNER JOIN product c ON b.p_num = c.p_num WHERE a.a_sale = 0 AND c.p_industry =#{kind})ta

SELECT *,
( 6371 * acos ( cos ( radians(#{lat}) ) * cos( radians( ad_lat ) ) * cos( radians( ad_lon ) - radians(#{lon}) ) + sin ( radians(#{lat}) ) * sin( radians( ad_lat ) ) ) ) AS distance FROM auction a LEFT JOIN address b ON b.a_num = a.a_num LEFT JOIN auc_and_pro c ON c.a_num = a.a_num LEFT JOIN product d ON d.p_num = c.p_num LEFT JOIN picture e ON e.p_num = d.p_num WHERE d.p_industry = #{industry} AND a.a_sale = 0 GROUP BY a.a_num ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT #{limit}, 6

SELECT *,
( 6371 * acos ( cos ( radians(#{lat}) ) * cos( radians( ad_lat ) ) * cos( radians( ad_lon ) - radians(#{lon}) ) + sin ( radians(#{lat}) ) * sin( radians( ad_lat ) ) ) ) AS distance FROM auction a LEFT JOIN address b ON b.a_num = a.a_num LEFT JOIN auc_and_pro c ON c.a_num = a.a_num LEFT JOIN product d ON d.p_num = c.p_num LEFT JOIN picture e ON e.p_num = d.p_num WHERE d.p_kind = #{kind} AND a.a_sale = 0 GROUP BY a.a_num ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT #{limit}, 6
